info.name: Tumblr Emphasize Links
info.description: Tumblr's links are barely visible. With this fix, they're visible again.
info.additionalInfo:
Tumblr's links are only faintly visible. Sometimes I overlook that a link exists, which is annoying, because sometimes the reference is crucial to understand the sentence. Look at the example: If you don't see the link, you'd wonder whether I've gone insane.

This fix emphasizes links again, by using the good old colored-underline, which doesn't normally appear in posts, and therefore ensures distinguishability.

CHROME/CHROMIUM USERS PLEASE READ:
The "color" setting may not work in chrome. That's not my fault: Chrome doesn't implement the "text-decoration-color" attribute, and Firefox only knows it as "-moz-text-decoration-color". Sigh.
